body_html: @rdadolf Closing this one out due to inactivity. I don't see anything fundamentally broken about using pip with --prefix and using $PYTHONPATH later, at least in the platforms I tried. Please feel free to reopen if you think this is still an issue worth solving.

body: @rdadolf Closing this one out due to inactivity. I don't see anything fundamentally broken about using `pip` with `--prefix` and using `$PYTHONPATH` later, at least in the platforms I tried. Please feel free to reopen if you think this is still an issue worth solving.
